rules_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice this Fortification or Fortified land: Discover 4. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](To discover 4, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
Fortify {2} [i]({2}: Attach to target land you control. Fortify only as a sorcery.)[/i]
